name: TimelineProcessFlow
description: Vertical timeline with alternating media/content layout and scroll-triggered progress line animation.

description.example: Discover the milestones that shaped our story

buttonRules.note: Button variant controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant. All sections should be wrapped in a single ThemeProvider at the app/page level.

structure.id: string - Unique identifier displayed in number badge (required)
structure.content: React.ReactNode - Custom content for the item (required)
structure.media: React.ReactNode - Custom media element (image, video, etc.) (required)
structure.reverse: boolean - When true, swaps media/content positions on desktop (required)

itemRules.note: Fully flexible - pass any ReactNode for content and media. Common patterns: media (Image/video), content (h3 title + p description + ul list with icons).

propsSchema.items: Array<{ id: string, content: React.ReactNode, media: React.ReactNode, reverse: boolean }> - Timeline items with content and media
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)
propsSchema.animationType: 'none' | 'opacity' | 'slide-up' | 'scale-rotate' | 'blur-reveal' (required - controls GSAP scroll animations with stagger effect)
